channel.title: BlueScape 562 Server Development <3
channel.description:
[size=36pt]BlueScape[/size]
[img]http://img39.imageshack.us/img39/7292/899763858c2497m3.png[/img]
Please ignore the ugly "banner", I just made it from a website. So anyway, I just wanted too post some "Achievments" that I do on this Source, I'll be using a Blank 562 Source that I downloaded from Rl. *Nothing on the banner is true atm, just wanted a ok one lol.)
I'll be working on this alone, as I seem too work better by myself =/. But anywho, let's get on with the server ;].
*Server Developers* -> Wall-e (me).
[size=12pt]Current Features:[/size]
1.) A Very Shitty Combat-Base. 2.) Basic Commands. 3.) Working Spells. 4.) Monsters drop bones atleast, nothing more, nothing less. 5.) BAYUM. That's it really lol. 6.) Clan-Chat 7.) An Ok Lootshare system. 8.) Login Welcome Screen. 9.) Soulsplit Working now <3. 10.) All Ancient Prayers have Anims + Gfx, time to work on them now thou :3. 11.) Donator System and Member Benefits. 12.) Barrages work. 13.) Players now need Runes too cast Spells. 14.) New Home. ;p. 15.) Emotes now Work. 16.) Unusual capes give emotes now (Red Soulwars cape acts as Dung Emote. 17.) Runecrafting is fine now. 18.) Duel-Arena works :3. 19.) NPC's have drops now. 20.) Custom Achievment Diary Tab, acts as a User Control Panel now.
(y)(y)(y)(y)(y) *thumbz up.)
[size=12pt]Updates Being Programmed ATM:[/size]
-> Making it so players need runes too cast spells. -> Clipped Following -> White Clan Wars Portal, And Red Portal. (White = Safe | Red = Dangerous. -> Ancient Prayers working 100% -> Custom Quests | Quest. -> Working Vengeance Other. -> Working God of Wars Dungeon. -> Bank Pins. -> Mining | Smithing.
[size=12pt]Future Updates:[/size]
-> Working Clanwars Minigame. -> Spirit Shield Making, with 90 Prayer for Divine/Elysian | 75 Prayer for Spectral/Arcane. -> Working Teleport Other spells. -> Fishing 100% Working. -> Firemaking -> Makeover Mage. -> Randoms. -> Working Report Abuse button. -> Barrows Drops | Minigame. -> Assembling and Dismantling Godswords. -> Arrows drop while Ranging. -> Arrows|Bolts give Ranged Bonus stats. -> Stable Fucking Economy... not Armadyl Godswords at 7B lool. -> Rare items will be RARES. Such as phats, santas, h'ween masks, etc. -> Construction. -> Exp Lamps (hah no 562 has that yet gf, first one to post|do it =D) -> Bank Pins.. -> Lending weapons. -> Stat Spy (Lunar Spell) -> Multi-Way PvP Wilderness. (So like the Wildy is like a huge FFA (Free-For-All) Multi Area lolz.) -> Smithing | Mining. (Am gonna fix that fucking auto clicking mining glitch, I've left my auto clicker on servers for like 20 mins on a ore, and I get like 240M Exp in Mining lool.) -> Fletching. -> Working Morphing Eggs on Easter Ring. -> Working Clan Ranks. -> Quick Chat for muted players / pkers. -> Voting Rewards. -> NPC that resets players stats of their choice (Dunno though.) -> Herby. -> Bank Tabs. -> Better Banners lool. -> Working Rest, (Restores run 2-3x faster, dunno which I should do). -> Many more, these are just what comes too mind atm.
==============================================================
Right now gonna ask some basic FAQ's.
[i]#1Q.) Will you be hosting this? [/i]
#1A.) No. One of my best friends that have done servers with me before will be hosting it. He can leave his computer on all night (he bots fishing so ofc it'll be on all night). It's a 64-bit Operating System with 12GB of RAM using a AMD E-350 Processor with 3.20 GHz (Talk about epic porn... lol :p.)
[i]#2Q.)Will you be releasing this?[/i]
#2A) Maybe.. it all depends really, especially if it gets leaked, cuz if that happens, I mind as well release it so I can get my credits, and create a v2.0, cuz you know what they say, when all fails v2 prevails. ===============================================================
But yeah, I'm not gonna quit on this "Project", as I hope too finish it, so I'ma do this alone =/. If someone is good with Banners thou, and you wanna post your work please do =D. I'd give you 20% creds on my server and a special server message thanking you for it. :3. Anywho, more update logs later, and pics for sure.
Btw, if you all have any suggestions please post away, and leave em here. :3.
I'll be posting updates hourly from now on so =d. Heres most recent Updates.
[size=12pt]Updates:[/size]
[9:08 AM 6/21/2011]
-> Just got up like 20 minutes ago.. gonna go work on Server. -> Made 5M in 3 hours last night on real rs scamming people with goodie bag, lol? xD. -> Added Basic Mining. -> Added Thieiving -> Realized I had too up to a higher cache, as 562 alone does NOT have the correct Configs for Curses, etc. FFS. -> Updated too .562_cache_32v4 -> Created a login screen =o. For some reason I set the strings right for the Message of the week, and they don't show. Fuck it. -> Made a new home, changed it too a place I found wandering around lol. (Coords: x2562, y2846, z0) It's oke ;d. -> Made it so clicking on a Quest opens some interfaces, (though if someone could help me change the name of quest would be ftw) -> Added some Quick-Chat buttons, only the levels though. -> Made it so people need runes too cast spells / auto cast =D -> Adding Thieving stalls too steal from, lowest will give 50k, middle 260k, and highest 400k. -> Created some NPC Drops! Though their 100% l0l. -> Created about 3 NPC's too talk to, they either offer too teleport you, or sign up on forums that I don't even have yet. -> Emotes are added ;3. Still working on Proper skillcape emotes though. -> Added some Server Messages :3. (Nothing big though.) -> K I realized why theres no message of the week, it crashes the client. -> Started on Prayer, really want to finish up curses thou but I think I should finish modern prayer book. -> Barrage gives a delay on NPC's and Players. -> Multi-Way PvP =D.
Sorry power went out... but I worked on it via localhost ;p.
[6/22/2011] [3:08 AM]
-> Got the Curses Configs, now working on the leeches/berserk/soulsplit/turmoil effects. -> Added a small quest to activate the Cursed Prayers. -> Added a small user control panel in the Achievment Diary. -> Venge Other works now 100%. -> Am working on heal other now, just gotta come up with a formula with giving 75% of hp to the other person. -> Made it HD/Full-Screen Compatible =d. -> Added Strykeworms too drop SoL's. (They also give 7k exp per kill if your slayer assignment.) -> My quest is so sexy ;p. lol. -> Thats it for now =d.
[size=24pt]Pictures ;o[/size]
Soulsplit working with Turmoil Anims + GFX.
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/rjdwjn.png[/img]
Working Clan-Chat :3.
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2lnfoqw.png[/img]
Working Clan-Ranks. <3.
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2mxon47.png[/img]
[June 23rd, 2011 Updates.]
-> Curses Work 100% Now. (Most was done on June 22nd.) -> Added a Pk Point System and Shop. -> More too come, only 2 updates I Started at (7am now) -> Quickchat.
Quick Chat | Vengeance | Pk Point System.
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/maue7l.png[/img]
More too come later.

item.title: BlueScape 562 Server Development <3
item.dc:creator: @No_Life2 No Life
item.description:
@No_Life2 wrote:

hawkgames:

How the hell do you program when your 7? Besides being some sort of genius if that was true, you probably would have a job already. : |

Programming isn’t that hard…I started with a web language (HTML) which isn’t a programming language. I didn’t start PHP (a web-based programming language) until I was 9, so I guess I technically have been doing it since 9 years old.

And I do have a job. I make java-based desktop applications for my uncle (he pays me).

I also work at the local ice cream shop (Cold Stone). Which is currently my only method of exercise…lol I’m soooo lazy.

P.S. when you learn one programming language…it’s easy to learn the rest of them.

Read full topic

item.title: BlueScape 562 Server Development <3
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

                                                    [size=36pt]BlueScape[/size]

Please ignore the ugly “banner”, I just made it from a website. So anyway, I just wanted too post some “Achievments” that I do on this Source, I’ll be using a Blank 562 Source that I downloaded from Rl. *Nothing on the banner is true atm, just wanted a ok one lol.)

I’ll be working on this alone, as I seem too work better by myself =/. But anywho, let’s get on with the server ;].

Server Developers
-> Wall-e (me).

[size=12pt]Current Features:[/size]

1.) A Very Shitty Combat-Base.
2.) Basic Commands.
3.) Working Spells.
4.) Monsters drop bones atleast, nothing more, nothing less.
5.) BAYUM. That’s it really lol.
6.) Clan-Chat
7.) An Ok Lootshare system.
8.) Login Welcome Screen.
9.) Soulsplit Working now <3.
10.) All Ancient Prayers have Anims + Gfx, time to work on them now thou :3.
11.) Donator System and Member Benefits.
12.) Barrages work.
13.) Players now need Runes too cast Spells.
14.) New Home. ;p.
15.) Emotes now Work.
16.) Unusual capes give emotes now (Red Soulwars cape acts as Dung Emote.
17.) Runecrafting is fine now.
18.) Duel-Arena works :3.
19.) NPC’s have drops now.
20.) Custom Achievment Diary Tab, acts as a User Control Panel now.

(y)(y)(y)(y)(y) *thumbz up.)

[size=12pt]Updates Being Programmed ATM:[/size]

-> Making it so players need runes too cast spells.
-> Clipped Following
-> White Clan Wars Portal, And Red Portal. (White = Safe | Red = Dangerous.
-> Ancient Prayers working 100%
-> Custom Quests | Quest.
-> Working Vengeance Other.
-> Working God of Wars Dungeon.
-> Bank Pins.
-> Mining | Smithing.

[size=12pt]Future Updates:[/size]

-> Working Clanwars Minigame.
-> Spirit Shield Making, with 90 Prayer for Divine/Elysian | 75 Prayer for Spectral/Arcane.
-> Working Teleport Other spells.
-> Fishing 100% Working.
-> Firemaking
-> Makeover Mage.
-> Randoms.
-> Working Report Abuse button.
-> Barrows Drops | Minigame.
-> Assembling and Dismantling Godswords.
-> Arrows drop while Ranging.
-> Arrows|Bolts give Ranged Bonus stats.
-> Stable Fucking Economy… not Armadyl Godswords at 7B lool.
-> Rare items will be RARES. Such as phats, santas, h’ween masks, etc.
-> Construction.
-> Exp Lamps (hah no 562 has that yet gf, first one to post|do it =D)
-> Bank Pins…
-> Lending weapons.
-> Stat Spy (Lunar Spell)
-> Multi-Way PvP Wilderness. (So like the Wildy is like a huge FFA (Free-For-All) Multi Area lolz.)
-> Smithing | Mining. (Am gonna fix that fucking auto clicking mining glitch, I’ve left my auto clicker on servers for like 20 mins on a ore, and I get like 240M Exp in Mining lool.)
-> Fletching.
-> Working Morphing Eggs on Easter Ring.
-> Working Clan Ranks.
-> Quick Chat for muted players / pkers.
-> Voting Rewards.
-> NPC that resets players stats of their choice (Dunno though.)
-> Herby.
-> Bank Tabs.
-> Better Banners lool.
-> Working Rest, (Restores run 2-3x faster, dunno which I should do).
-> Many more, these are just what comes too mind atm.

==============================================================

Right now gonna ask some basic FAQ’s.

#1Q.) Will you be hosting this?

#1A.) No. One of my best friends that have done servers with me before will be hosting it. He can leave his computer on all night (he bots fishing so ofc it’ll be on all night). It’s a 64-bit Operating System with 12GB of RAM using a AMD E-350 Processor with 3.20 GHz (Talk about epic porn… lol :p.)

#2Q.)Will you be releasing this?

#2A) Maybe… it all depends really, especially if it gets leaked, cuz if that happens, I mind as well release it so I can get my credits, and create a v2.0, cuz you know what they say, when all fails v2 prevails.

                  But yeah, I'm not gonna quit on this "Project", as I hope too finish it, so I'ma do this alone =/. If someone is good with Banners thou, and you wanna post your work please do =D. I'd give you 20% creds on my server and a special server message thanking you for it. :3. Anywho, more update logs later, and pics for sure.

Btw, if you all have any suggestions please post away, and leave em here. :3.

I’ll be posting updates hourly from now on so =d. Heres most recent Updates.

[size=12pt]Updates:[/size]

[9:08 AM 6/21/2011]

-> Just got up like 20 minutes ago… gonna go work on Server.
-> Made 5M in 3 hours last night on real rs scamming people with goodie bag, lol? xD.
-> Added Basic Mining.
-> Added Thieiving
-> Realized I had too up to a higher cache, as 562 alone does NOT have the correct
Configs for Curses, etc. FFS.
-> Updated too .562_cache_32v4
-> Created a login screen =o. For some reason I set the strings right for the Message of
the week, and they don’t show. Fuck it.
-> Made a new home, changed it too a place I found wandering around lol.
(Coords: x2562, y2846, z0) It’s oke ;d.
-> Made it so clicking on a Quest opens some interfaces, (though if someone could help
me change the name of quest would be ftw)
-> Added some Quick-Chat buttons, only the levels though.
-> Made it so people need runes too cast spells / auto cast =D
-> Adding Thieving stalls too steal from, lowest will give 50k, middle 260k, and highest
400k.
-> Created some NPC Drops! Though their 100% l0l.
-> Created about 3 NPC’s too talk to, they either offer too teleport you, or sign up on
forums that I don’t even have yet.
-> Emotes are added ;3. Still working on Proper skillcape emotes though.
-> Added some Server Messages :3. (Nothing big though.)
-> K I realized why theres no message of the week, it crashes the client.
-> Started on Prayer, really want to finish up curses thou but I think I should finish
modern prayer book.
-> Barrage gives a delay on NPC’s and Players.
-> Multi-Way PvP =D.

Sorry power went out… but I worked on it via localhost ;p.

[6/22/2011]
[3:08 AM]

-> Got the Curses Configs, now working on the leeches/berserk/soulsplit/turmoil
effects.
-> Added a small quest to activate the Cursed Prayers.
-> Added a small user control panel in the Achievment Diary.
-> Venge Other works now 100%.
-> Am working on heal other now, just gotta come up with a formula with giving 75%
of hp to the other person.
-> Made it HD/Full-Screen Compatible =d.
-> Added Strykeworms too drop SoL’s. (They also give 7k exp per kill if your slayer
assignment.)
-> My quest is so sexy ;p. lol.
-> Thats it for now =d.

                              [size=24pt]Pictures ;o[/size]

Soulsplit working with Turmoil Anims + GFX.

rjdwjn.png1366×768 

Working Clan-Chat :3.

2lnfoqw.png1023×575

Working Clan-Ranks. <3.

2mxon47.png1023×575

[June 23rd, 2011 Updates.]

-> Curses Work 100% Now. (Most was done on June 22nd.)
-> Added a Pk Point System and Shop.
-> More too come, only 2 updates I Started at (7am now)
-> Quickchat.

Quick Chat | Vengeance | Pk Point System.

maue7l.png782×539

More too come later.

Read full topic
